about_the_game:
Get ready for a Heist Party!
Molementum is a 3D party action game where you assume the role of a mole criminal to rob mines of their precious gems. Grab up to 3 friends and scramble your way through industrial mines engaging in various acts of competitive mischief as you try to become the most notorious mole criminal. Upgrade yourself between rounds with different abilities that will extend your nefarious arsenal to complete constantly changing objectives.

Battle your friends!
Compete with up to three other players online in the ultimate heist party. Outsmart and outmaneuver your friends in order to collect the most gems!

Gain molementum!
Move around by swapping between digging and rolling - dig for fast reactive movement that can allow you to burrow up underneath your fellow moles to attack, or use the momentum of a roll to gain even more speed and become an unstoppable fireball that grows in reach with your speed.

Upgrade your mole!
Unlock a bevy of unique and wacky upgrades between rounds of play. Take to the skies, stun other players, and summon otherworldly buddies to your command.

Changing challenges!
Players will face different objectives round to round that tie into an evolving story. Collect the most soda, fight to stay on camera, and fight each other!
